translated: The going forth is from the preceptor alone, but the vow is from another.üîΩThe ceremony for taking the full name is from the first preceptor alone.

original: yongs su dag pa la skabs dbye'o zhes bya ba smras te /
analyzed: yongs su dag pa la skabs dbye'o zhes bya ba smras te /

analyzed: rab tu byung ba nyid la gang zhig bar chad byed pa ma bsad pa la sogs pa de ni 'dir bar chad du mngon par 'dod do //
translated: Here, an obstacle is considered to be anything that would prevent going forth, such as killing one‚Äôs mother.

analyzed: de bas na rten gang zhig rab tu 'byung ba nyid la ltos pa'i bar chad dris nas gal te 'di la chos de rnams yod pa ma yin na /

original: de'i phyir yongs su dag pa 'di la dang po'i mkhan po nyid kyis dge tshul gyi mkhan po nyid kyis bdag gis khyod rab tu dbyung ngo zhes skabs dbye ba ni bya ba'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir yongs su dag pa 'di la dang po'i mkhan po nyid kyis dge tshul gyi mkhan po nyid kyis bdag gis khyod rab tu dbyung ngo zhes skabs dbye ba ni bya ba'o //

original: de ltar na yang gzhung las gang su dag las rab tu byung ba la ltos pa nye bar 'gro bar byed pa de des bar chad kyi chos rnams dris te gzhung bar bya zhes bya'o //
analyzed: de ltar na yang gzhung las gang su dag las rab tu byung ba la ltos pa nye bar 'gro bar byed pa de des bar chad kyi chos rnams dris te gzhung bar bya zhes bya'o //

original: sdom @5b pa rnams kyi go rims bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: sdom @5b pa rnams kyi go rims bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
translated: In order to demonstrate the sequence of the vows,

original: dge bsnyen nyid dang dge tshul nyid dang dge slong nyid dag gi snga ma bsnyen par ma rdzogs pa la phyi ma mi bya'o zhes smras te /
analyzed: dge bsnyen nyid dang dge tshul nyid dang dge slong nyid dag gi snga ma bsnyen par ma rdzogs pa la phyi ma mi bya'o zhes smras te /

original: dge bsnyen nyid la sogs pa 'di rnams kyi snga ma snga ma ni snga ma bsnyen par ma rdzogs pa la de'i bdag nyid du nye bar song bas khas ma blangs pa la gang zhig phyi ma phyi ma de ni bya ba ma yin te /
analyzed: dge bsnyen nyid la sogs pa 'di rnams kyi snga ma snga ma ni snga ma bsnyen par ma rdzogs pa la de'i bdag nyid du nye bar song bas khas ma blangs pa la gang zhig phyi ma phyi ma de ni bya ba ma yin te /
translated: The latter vows cannot be taken by one who has not taken the former vows, because the former vows are not present in the latter vows.

original: 'di ni rnam par gzhag pa bstan pa'o //
analyzed: 'di ni rnam par gzhag pa bstan pa'o //
translated: This is the presentation of the sequence of the vows.

original: bar chad dris nas rab tu byung ba gzung ba la ltos pa dang po dge bsnyen nyid 'dzin du gzhug go //
analyzed: bar chad dris nas rab tu byung ba gzung ba la ltos pa dang po dge bsnyen nyid 'dzin du gzhug go //
translated: After examining for impediments, one who is to be admitted to the order is first admitted as a layperson.

original: de nas dge tshul nyid dang / de nas dge slong nyid 'byung ba yin no zhes bya ba 'di shes par bya ba'i don du ste /
analyzed: de nas dge tshul nyid dang / de nas dge slong nyid 'byung ba yin no zhes bya ba 'di shes par bya ba'i don du ste /

original: 'di'i don ni ma yin te /
analyzed: 'di'i don ni ma yin te /

original: snga ma ma bzung ba la phyi ma skye ba 'byung ba ma yin no zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: snga ma ma bzung ba la phyi ma skye ba 'byung ba ma yin no zhes bya ba'o //

analyzed: dge slong gi sdom pa'i sngon du sdom pa gzhan skye ba la yang khungs kyi tshig gtso bo yod pa nyid de /

analyzed: dge tshul gyi sdom pa la ni dge bsnyen gyi sdom pa med par skye ba 'byung ba yin no //
translated: The vows of a novice monk arise without the vows of a layperson.

original: dge slong gi sdom pa la ni khungs kyi tshig yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: dge slong gi sdom pa la ni khungs kyi tshig yod pa ma yin no //
translated: But there is no primary source for the vows of a fully ordained monk.üîΩTo explain that one should take the vows after going for refuge,

original: skyabs su 'gro ba sngon du 'gro bas sdom pa blang ngo zhes bstan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: skyabs su 'gro ba sngon du 'gro bas sdom pa blang ngo zhes bstan pa'i phyir /
translated: the sutra states:

original: skyabs su 'gro ba khas blangs pa'i tshig rtsom pa dang / dge bsnyen nyid dang dge tshul nyid du khas blangs pa'i tshig bya'o zhes smras te /
analyzed: skyabs su 'gro ba khas blangs pa'i tshig rtsom pa dang / dge bsnyen nyid dang dge tshul nyid du khas blangs pa'i tshig bya'o zhes smras te /
translated: One should begin the words of accepting refuge and the words of accepting the vows of a layperson and the vows of a novice monk.

original: 'gro ba ni 'gro ba ste skyabs su 'gro ba khas len pa'o //
analyzed: 'gro ba ni 'gro ba ste skyabs su 'gro ba khas len pa'o //
translated: Going is the going for refuge, the acceptance of refuge.

original: sangs rgyas la skyabs su mchi'o zhes bya ba la sogs pa de rjod par byed pa'i tshig skyabs su 'gro ba khas blangs pa'i tshig ni de'i tshig go //
analyzed: sangs rgyas la skyabs su mchi'o zhes bya ba la sogs pa de rjod par byed pa'i tshig skyabs su 'gro ba khas blangs pa'i tshig ni de'i tshig go //
translated: The words of the acceptance of going for refuge are the words that express the statement, ‚ÄúI go for refuge to the Buddha,‚Äù and so on.

original: rtsom pa ni brtsams pa'o //
analyzed: rtsom pa ni brtsams pa'o //

original: dge bsnyen nyid dang dge tshul nyid du khas blangs pa'i tshig bya'o zhes smras te /
analyzed: dge bsnyen nyid dang dge tshul nyid du khas blangs pa'i tshig bya'o zhes smras te /
translated: The words of the acceptance of the status of a lay practitioner and the status of a novice are the words that are spoken.

original: de su zhig ce na /
analyzed: de su zhig ce na /
translated: Who speaks them?

original: sgrub pa po'o //
analyzed: sgrub pa po'o //
translated: The practitioner.

original: de ni 'di yin te /üîΩ'di ltar len pa pos smra bar bya ste /
analyzed: de ni 'di yin te / 'di ltar len pa pos smra bar bya ste /

original: btsun pa dgongs su gsol /
analyzed: btsun pa dgongs su gsol /
translated: The practitioner should say, ‚ÄúVenerable, please listen.

original: bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba /
analyzed: bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba /
translated: I, named so-and-so,

original: sangs rgyas la skyabs su mchi'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas la skyabs su mchi'o //

analyzed: tshogs rnams kyi mchog dge 'dun la skyabs su mchi'o //

original: ji srid 'tsho'i bar @6a * //
analyzed: ji srid 'tsho'i bar @6a * //

analyzed: gang kha cig dang por skyabs su 'gro ba la lan gsum du brjod nas de'i 'og tu btsun pas bdag dge bsnyen du gzung du gsol /

analyzed: bdag dge tshul du slob dpon gyis gzung du gsol zhes bya ba brjod pa 'dis ni mi rigs par brjod par bya'o //

analyzed: 'di ni ci nas kyang mya ngan las 'da' ba'i bsam pa rab tu skyed pa'i don du dus su 'di la brjod par bya ba ste /

analyzed: gang gi phyir 'di ltar sdom pa yang dag par blangs pa'i tshig dag gis 'di ni yan lag tu gyur pa yin gyi gzhan du ni ma yin no //
translated: The refuge is a limb of the vows, but not of the mere refuge, because the vows are taken with the words of the vow itself.

analyzed: mya ngan las 'das pa'i bsam pa brten po med par sdom pa blang ba ni ma yin te /

original: 'dis ni skyon du mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: 'dis ni skyon du mi 'gyur te /

analyzed: bsnyen par rdzogs pa'i sgra nyid las ni de'i don bsgrub pa'i phyir dang / bya ba ma yin pa thams cad ldog pa'i mtshan nyid kyi phyir ro //

analyzed: gang gi phyir rnam pa thams cad du mya ngan las 'das par khas len pa ni bsnyen par rdzogs pa yin te /

analyzed: gang gi phyir bsnyen par rdzogs pa la gnas pa mya ngan las 'das pa la rjes su mthun par rnam par gnas par 'gyur ro //

analyzed: gang zhig 'dir gzhan gyis brjod pa de ni slob par byed pa zhes bya bar shes par bya'i sbyin pa dang len pa ni ma yin no //

analyzed: bsnyen gnas la yang sgrub pa po nyid kyis 'di bya zhes bya ba shes par bya'o //

analyzed: 'di rnam par gsal ba'i don du dge slong la zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //

analyzed: bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba btsun pa la mkhan por gsol bar bgyi'o //

analyzed: dge tshul nyid du khas blangs pa la rgyun dang rab tu chad pa dag skyabs su 'gro ba dang dge tshul nyid du khas len pa'o //

analyzed: de la tha ma rab tu chad pa ni don gzhan la rjes su 'gro ba ste /

analyzed: bdag dge tshul zhes bya bar slob dpon gyis gzung du gsol zhes bya ba rnam pa gnyis su byas te /
translated: Please accept me, by the name so-and-so, as a novice.

original: gsum nyid du nges pa yin no //
analyzed: gsum nyid du nges pa yin no //

analyzed: mtshams @9b gcad pa la sogs pa thams cad la cho ga 'di blta bar bya'o //

original: de ltar na gsang ste ston pa las gsang ste bstan pa ma rdzogs pa la slob dpon nyid dang / dge tshul nyid du nye bar sgrub pa'i dus 'di la las byed pa 'di lta bu zhes bya bas so //

original: gnas sbyin pa dang klog pa po dag la dus gang gi tshe na zhes bya ba shes pa ma yin te /
analyzed: gnas sbyin pa dang klog pa po dag la dus gang gi tshe na zhes bya ba shes pa ma yin te /
translated: The giver of the rite and the reader do not know at what time it is said, When?

analyzed: gnas sbyin pa dang klog pa po dag gi tshad la mi gnas pa nyid kyi phyir ro //

analyzed: de la ci tsam gyis 'di dag la slob dpon nyid du bya ba nyid bshad par bya'o //

analyzed: gnas sbyin pa ni zhag gcig gnas nyid kyi phyir nye bar gnas pa mthar thug pas zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The giver of the rite is one who abides for one day, because of the final abiding.

original: zhag gcig ces bya ba ni nyin mo dang mtshan mo gcig ni zhag gcig ste /
analyzed: zhag gcig ces bya ba ni nyin mo dang mtshan mo gcig ni zhag gcig ste /

analyzed: gnas kyi slob dpon la gnas pa'i slad du gnas nyid kyi gang zhig nye bar gnas pa la mthar thug pa nyid gnas sbyin pa mthar thug pa'o //
translated: The teacher of the place is the one who provides the place for the one who is seeking a place.

original: de ltar yang gzhung las gnas kyi slob dpon ni gang yin zhe na /
analyzed: de ltar yang gzhung las gnas kyi slob dpon ni gang yin zhe na /

analyzed: gang zhig nye bar mtshan mo gcig kyang gnas pa nas gnas su 'gyur zhes bya ba'o //
translated: He is the one who provides a place for the one who is seeking a place, even for one night.

original: 'di nas brtsams te 'di la yongs su rdzogs pa'i ngo bo nyid tshu rol du ni reg pa tsam mi 'gro ba'i mthar thug pa ma byas pa nyid kyis yid la nges par 'brel bzhin pa nges pa'i grangs su 'gro bar 'os pa ma yin no ;
analyzed: 'di nas brtsams te 'di la yongs su rdzogs pa'i ngo bo nyid tshu rol du ni reg pa tsam mi 'gro ba'i mthar thug pa ma byas pa nyid kyis yid la nges par 'brel bzhin pa nges pa'i grangs su 'gro bar 'os pa ma yin no ;
translated: From this point on, the one who has not completed the nature of the teacher, who has not gone to the end of the path of not going even a little, is not fit to be counted among the teachers, even though he is certainly connected with the mind.

original: klog pa ni tshigs su bcad pa gcig lan gsum bzlas na'o zhes bya ba ni gang zhig dang nye bar klog pa'i bsam pas tshigs su bcad pa gcig lan gsum du bzlas pa de ni klog ba'i slob dpon no //
analyzed: klog pa ni tshigs su bcad pa gcig lan gsum bzlas na'o zhes bya ba ni gang zhig dang nye bar klog pa'i bsam pas tshigs su bcad pa gcig lan gsum du bzlas pa de ni klog ba'i slob dpon no //
translated: The teacher of recitation is the one who recites a verse three times. The one who recites a verse three times with the intention of reciting it is the teacher of recitation.

original: de ltar na klog pa'i mthar thug pa'o //
analyzed: de ltar na klog pa'i mthar thug pa'o //
translated: Thus, this is the culmination of reading.

original: de ltar yang gzhung las /
analyzed: de ltar yang gzhung las /
translated: And so the treatise says,

original: klog pa'i slob dpon gang zhe na /
analyzed: klog pa'i slob dpon gang zhe na /

original: gang zhig dang nye bar rkang pa bzhi'i tshigs su bcad pa yang lan gsum bzlas nas 'dzin par 'gyur zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: gang zhig dang nye bar rkang pa bzhi'i tshigs su bcad pa yang lan gsum bzlas nas 'dzin par 'gyur zhes bya ba'o //

original: de bas na 'dir drang srong gi gzhung gi dgongs pa 'di mtshon pa yin no //
analyzed: de bas na 'dir drang srong gi gzhung gi dgongs pa 'di mtshon pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, this is the intended meaning of the sage‚Äôs text.

analyzed: klog pa'i slob dpon gyis brjod pa'i klog pa po'i rjes su brjod pa ni 'dzin pa'o //
translated: The recitation that is expressed by the teacher of reading is the recitation that is expressed by the reciter.

original: lan cig brjod pa la reg pa tsam ma rdzogs pa'i ngo bo'i klog pa yid la nges par 'brel pa yin no //
analyzed: lan cig brjod pa la reg pa tsam ma rdzogs pa'i ngo bo'i klog pa yid la nges par 'brel pa yin no //
translated: The recitation that is not complete in the mere contact with a single recitation is the recitation that is ascertained in the mind.

analyzed: lan gsum du brtsams nas mthar thug par 'gro ba dang 'dra bar rgyun bzhin du mtshon pa yin no //
translated: Just as it is begun three times and goes to the end, it is illustrated as a continuum.üîΩTherefore, this is the culmination of reading.

original: de bas na klog pa'i mthar thug ba 'di rigs pa yin zhes bya ba'o //üîΩslob dpon rin chen seng @10a * //
analyzed: de bas na klog pa'i mthar thug ba 'di rigs pa yin zhes bya ba'o // slob dpon rin chen seng @10a * //

original: ges gsungs pa /
analyzed: ges gsungs pa /
translated: The master Ratnasena says,üîΩ‚ÄúWhat is the culmination of reading?

original: ma thu ra'i klog pa rnams ni 'di lta bur gyur pa ste /
analyzed: ma thu ra'i klog pa rnams ni 'di lta bur gyur pa ste /
translated: The reciters of the Mathura school are of this type.

original: 'di ltar mthong ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'di ltar mthong ba'i phyir ro //

original: des ni mdo 'di brtsams so //
analyzed: des ni mdo 'di brtsams so //

original: 'di ltar rigs pa ma yin te /
analyzed: 'di ltar rigs pa ma yin te /

analyzed: gang gi phyir gang zhig 'di gzhung la ma ltos par mdo byed pa yin no //
translated: Because one composes a Sutra without relying on a text.

original: de la 'thad pa smras pa /
analyzed: de la 'thad pa smras pa /
translated: The one who is reasonable says this:

analyzed: 'di ni rigs pa med par mdo tsam nyid du nye bar 'brel ba ste /

analyzed: dper na kha ton byed pa la sogs pa lta bu'o //

analyzed: de lta bas na 'dir slob dpon nyid la lta ba ma yin no //

analyzed: de gnyis la gzhan du nye bar mi brjod do zhes bya ba ste //

analyzed: mdun du 'dug ste me mi 'de'o zhes bya ba ni gzhan yang me de bzhin pa la bsgribs nas bdag nyid kyis me mi 'de'o zhes bya ba'i tshig go //
translated: The phrase he does not kindle the fire himself means that he does not kindle the fire himself, having concealed it in the same way.

original: 'du 'dzi'i gtam yang ngo zhes bya ba ni der zhes bya bar sbyar te 'di ni 'dod pa dang rjes su mthun par byar shes nas bsro khang du 'jug pa na 'dod pa rnams yang dag par 'bar ba ni 'du 'dzi zhes bya'o //
analyzed: 'du 'dzi'i gtam yang ngo zhes bya ba ni der zhes bya bar sbyar te 'di ni 'dod pa dang rjes su mthun par byar shes nas bsro khang du 'jug pa na 'dod pa rnams yang dag par 'bar ba ni 'du 'dzi zhes bya'o //
translated: The phrase or engage in frivolous conversation means that he does not engage in frivolous conversation there, knowing that it is conducive to passion. The phrase the blazing of passion means that when he enters the sauna, he sees the blazing of passion in the form of the women's bodies.

original: de bas na 'dir 'di spong ba ni bye brag tu spong ba'o //
analyzed: de bas na 'dir 'di spong ba ni bye brag tu spong ba'o //
translated: Therefore, the phrase he should avoid that means that he should avoid that in particular.

original: 'phags pa'i mi smra ba nyid la dmigs pas so zhes bya ba ni der zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
analyzed: 'phags pa'i mi smra ba nyid la dmigs pas so zhes bya ba ni der zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
translated: The phrase because he is focused on the noble ones' silence means that he is focused on the noble ones' silence there.

original: rtogs pa mi bden pa dang / de dang rjes su mthun pa'i sems rnam par bzlog pa'i don du mdo 'di'o //
analyzed: rtogs pa mi bden pa dang / de dang rjes su mthun pa'i sems rnam par bzlog pa'i don du mdo 'di'o //
translated: This sutra has the purpose of countering the false understanding and the mind that is conducive to that.

original: 'phags pa'i mi smra ba nyid ni tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa la kun nas phyogs par byed par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: 'phags pa'i mi smra ba nyid ni tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa la kun nas phyogs par byed par rig par bya'o //
translated: The noble ones' silence should be understood as being conducive to proper mental attention.

original: mjug tu rgyun chags gsum pa gdon no zhes bya ba ni 'gro ba'i dus su'o //
analyzed: mjug tu rgyun chags gsum pa gdon no zhes bya ba ni 'gro ba'i dus su'o //
translated: At the end, one should recite the third continuous recitation. This is at the time of going.üîΩOne should not perform the act of cleaning for one who is wearing only one garment.

original: gos gcig pas byi dor gyi las mi bya'o zhes bya ba ni 'dir ni bsro khang gi tshig dang khro ba la gnas par grags pa'i gzhi gcig gis gcig gi tshig kyang kha cig byed de /
analyzed: gos gcig pas byi dor gyi las mi bya'o zhes bya ba ni 'dir ni bsro khang gi tshig dang khro ba la gnas par grags pa'i gzhi gcig gis gcig gi tshig kyang kha cig byed de /
translated: Here, some make the statement of the bathhouse and the statement of the basis of the known as abiding in anger.

original: chos gos gcig pa'i dge slong @32b rnams kyis bsro khang du gcig gis gcig la las mi bya zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: chos gos gcig pa'i dge slong @32b rnams kyis bsro khang du gcig gis gcig la las mi bya zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The monks who are wearing only one Dharma robe should not perform the act of cleaning for each other in the bathhouse.

original: las thams cad la lus la gnas pa nyid gnas thams cad la ma yin te /
analyzed: las thams cad la lus la gnas pa nyid gnas thams cad la ma yin te /
translated: In all actions, one should not stay in the body, but in all bases.

original: bsro khang nyid la cho ga 'di rnam par gnas pa ma yin pa nyid de /
analyzed: bsro khang nyid la cho ga 'di rnam par gnas pa ma yin pa nyid de /
translated: This rule does not apply to the bathhouse itself.

original: de bas na 'di bstan pa ma yin no //
analyzed: de bas na 'di bstan pa ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, this is not taught.

original: lus kyi de la ma dad pa byed du mi gzhug go zhes bya ba la ;
analyzed: lus kyi de la ma dad pa byed du mi gzhug go zhes bya ba la ;
translated: One should not cause lack of faith in the body.

original: de zhes bya ba ni las so //
analyzed: de zhes bya ba ni las so //
translated: Here, the body refers to the action.

original: khur khur ba la sogs pa phyi rol gyi las ni bkag pa ma yin no //
analyzed: khur khur ba la sogs pa phyi rol gyi las ni bkag pa ma yin no //
translated: The external actions such as carrying loads are not prohibited.

original: 'di dang gong ma la yang bstan pa ni dad pa can du 'dod do zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: 'di dang gong ma la yang bstan pa ni dad pa can du 'dod do zhes bya ba la /
translated: Here and above, one who is faithful is considered to be a teacher.

original: bstan pa zhes bya ba ni dus ring po nas skyes pas gang zhig mi g-yo ba de ni bstan pa'o //
analyzed: bstan pa zhes bya ba ni dus ring po nas skyes pas gang zhig mi g-yo ba de ni bstan pa'o //

original: 'di dang zhes bya bas de ma thag tu brjod pa'i las kyi cho ga la'o //
analyzed: 'di dang zhes bya bas de ma thag tu brjod pa'i las kyi cho ga la'o //
translated: Here refers to the ritual action just mentioned.

original: gong ma la yang zhes bya ba ni dad pa can ma yin pa 'dir zhugs pa mi sbyin zhes bya ba 'di la'o //
analyzed: gong ma la yang zhes bya ba ni dad pa can ma yin pa 'dir zhugs pa mi sbyin zhes bya ba 'di la'o //
translated: Above refers to this statement: One who is not faithful should not be admitted here.

original: 'dod do zhes bya ba ni mngon par 'dod pa'o //
analyzed: 'dod do zhes bya ba ni mngon par 'dod pa'o //
translated: Considered means accepted.

original: seng ge lta bus wa lta bu la bsnyen bkur mi bya'o zhes bya ba ni tshul khrims dang ldan pas tshul khrims 'chal pa la nye bar gnas par mi bya zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: seng ge lta bus wa lta bu la bsnyen bkur mi bya'o zhes bya ba ni tshul khrims dang ldan pas tshul khrims 'chal pa la nye bar gnas par mi bya zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: One should not honor a fox-like person with lion-like behavior, meaning that one who has morality should not associate with one who lacks morality.

original: 'di la gsal bar byed pa yin pa ni /
analyzed: 'di la gsal bar byed pa yin pa ni /
translated: Here is the clarification:

original: slob dpon dang mkhan po mchog tu tshul khrims 'chal pa la yang bsnyen bkur bya'o //
analyzed: slob dpon dang mkhan po mchog tu tshul khrims 'chal pa la yang bsnyen bkur bya'o //
translated: One should honor even a teacher or preceptor who is extremely immoral.

original: pha ma dang nad pa dag ni khyim pa yin na yang ngo zhes bya ba ni mchog tu 'di rnams la phan par byed pa nyid kyi phyir de bas na 'di sngon du gnang ngo //
analyzed: pha ma dang nad pa dag ni khyim pa yin na yang ngo zhes bya ba ni mchog tu 'di rnams la phan par byed pa nyid kyi phyir de bas na 'di sngon du gnang ngo //
translated: The father and mother, even though they are householders, are the best benefactors of the child, because they are the best benefactors of the child, therefore, they are mentioned first.

original: legs par spyar ba'i khrus kyis bkru'o zhes bya ba ni 'dir gleng gzhi las 'dod pa yin te /
analyzed: legs par spyar ba'i khrus kyis bkru'o zhes bya ba ni 'dir gleng gzhi las 'dod pa yin te /
translated: One should bathe with a well-prepared bath - here, the basis of the discussion is desire.

original: nad pa'i tshig ni tha snyad du ma byas pa yin te /
analyzed: nad pa'i tshig ni tha snyad du ma byas pa yin te /
translated: The word patient is not used in conventional terms.

original: 'di la gzhan du mthun pa nyid kyang ma yin te /
analyzed: 'di la gzhan du mthun pa nyid kyang ma yin te /
translated: Here, it is not the same as elsewhere,

original: khyad par yongs su mi 'dzin pa'i phyir thams cad kyi dbang du mdzad nas nye bar brtags pa'o //
analyzed: khyad par yongs su mi 'dzin pa'i phyir thams cad kyi dbang du mdzad nas nye bar brtags pa'o //
translated: because it does not grasp the distinction, it is considered from the point of view of all.

original: de'i rang gi ngo bo nyid bstan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de'i rang gi ngo bo nyid bstan pa'i phyir /
translated: In order to show its own nature,

original: rlung 'dren pa'i rtsa ba dang sdong bu dang lo ma dang me tog dang 'bras bu bskol bas khrus bya ba ni de'i ming yin no zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: rlung 'dren pa'i rtsa ba dang sdong bu dang lo ma dang me tog dang 'bras bu bskol bas khrus bya ba ni de'i ming yin no zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: it is said: The bath prepared with the roots, stems, leaves, flowers and fruits of the wind-drawing tree is its name.

original: legs par sbyar ba'i khrus kyis bkru'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: legs par sbyar ba'i khrus kyis bkru'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is: One should bathe with a well-prepared bath.

original: bcud ni khrus kyi don to //
analyzed: bcud ni khrus kyi don to //
translated: The essence is the meaning of bathing.

original: de bas na 'di rnams la 'dir yan lag nyid do ;
analyzed: de bas na 'di rnams la 'dir yan lag nyid do ;
translated: Therefore, these are the limbs here.

original: / khrus ji ltar bya zhe na /
analyzed: / khrus ji ltar bya zhe na /
translated: How should one bathe?

original: bsku mnye byas nas te mi rtsub pa nyid kyi phyir ro zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: bsku mnye byas nas te mi rtsub pa nyid kyi phyir ro zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: After anointing with oil, because of non-roughness.

original: sran chung gi phye mas nye bar bsal ba'i phyir 'di mi rtsub pa'i don 'di la 'bru mar la sogs pas bsku mnye byas pas de dang dbral ba'i phyir sran chung gi phyes bsku mnye byas nas zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: sran chung gi phye mas nye bar bsal ba'i phyir 'di mi rtsub pa'i don 'di la 'bru mar la sogs pas bsku mnye byas pas de dang dbral ba'i phyir sran chung gi phyes bsku mnye byas nas zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: Because of removing with lentil flour, this is the meaning of non-roughness. The meaning of after anointing with lentil flour is because of removing that by anointing with oil, etc.

original: de dang @33a * //
analyzed: de dang @33a * //
translated: For that,

original: dbral ba'i phyir khrus gcal gyis so //üîΩsnga ma'i ched du chu'i bum pa phyi mar snum thigs pa gnyis sam gsum blugs so zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: dbral ba'i phyir khrus gcal gyis so // snga ma'i ched du chu'i bum pa phyi mar snum thigs pa gnyis sam gsum blugs so zhes bya ba ni /
translated: with a bathing cloth.üîΩFor the former, two or three drops of oil should be put into the latter water pot.

original: snga ma'i ched du zhes bya ba ni mi rtsub pa nyid kyi chang du gnyis sam gsum snum gyi thigs pa chu'i bum par phye ma blugs par bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: snga ma'i ched du zhes bya ba ni mi rtsub pa nyid kyi chang du gnyis sam gsum snum gyi thigs pa chu'i bum par phye ma blugs par bya ba'i don to //
translated: For the former means for the sake of non-roughness, two or three drops of oil should be put into the water pot with the flour.

original: lcags kyi gzhong rigs su khrus bya'o //
analyzed: lcags kyi gzhong rigs su khrus bya'o //
translated: He should bathe in an iron basin.

original: de ni nad pas bcang bar bya'o zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: de ni nad pas bcang bar bya'o zhes bya ba la /
translated: This is to be used by the sick.

original: de ni zhes bya ba ni lcags kyi gzhong pa'o //
analyzed: de ni zhes bya ba ni lcags kyi gzhong pa'o //
translated: This refers to the iron basin.

original: nad pa ma yin pas ni bcang bar mi rigs pa ste /
analyzed: nad pa ma yin pas ni bcang bar mi rigs pa ste /
translated: It is not proper for the healthy to use it,

original: lcags kyi ri lu ltar dgos pa med do zhes bya ba 'di la rtogs par bya'o //
analyzed: lcags kyi ri lu ltar dgos pa med do zhes bya ba 'di la rtogs par bya'o //
translated: because it is useless like an iron pill. This is to be understood.

original: 'di lta bu'i rigs can la don med par byed pa la nga rgyal yin te /
analyzed: 'di lta bu'i rigs can la don med par byed pa la nga rgyal yin te /
translated: In this kind of case, there is pride in doing what is useless.

original: de yang thams cad nyes par byas pa zhes bya ba go bzhin pa nyid kyi phyir mdor byas pa ma yin no //
analyzed: de yang thams cad nyes par byas pa zhes bya ba go bzhin pa nyid kyi phyir mdor byas pa ma yin no //
translated: And that is not included in the summary statement, because it is already understood as a misdeed.

original: de'i steng du kha gab gzhug go zhes bya ba ni chu dron mo la grang ba'i dngos po yongs su bsal ba'i phyir ro //üîΩder gnya' bar sngas nad tshangs can gzhug go zhes bya ba dang sbyar ro//
analyzed: de'i steng du kha gab gzhug go zhes bya ba ni chu dron mo la grang ba'i dngos po yongs su bsal ba'i phyir ro // der gnya' bar sngas nad tshangs can gzhug go zhes bya ba dang sbyar ro//
translated: He should place a lid on it, in order to remove the cold quality from the hot water.üîΩHe should place a pillow under his neck.

original: 'dir khrus ni thogs pa med par sdug bsngal med pa'i don du ste de bas na 'di bzung ba'o //
analyzed: 'dir khrus ni thogs pa med par sdug bsngal med pa'i don du ste de bas na 'di bzung ba'o //
translated: Here, bathing is for the purpose of removing pain without obstruction. Therefore, this is included.

original: gar bab bab tu rkang pa mi bkru'o zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: gar bab bab tu rkang pa mi bkru'o zhes bya ba la /

original: 'di ni gtsug lag khang gi dbang du byas pa'o //
analyzed: 'di ni gtsug lag khang gi dbang du byas pa'o //

original: de'i gnas ni wa khar ro zhes bya ba la /

original: de'i zhes bya ba ni rkang pa bkru ba'o //
analyzed: de'i zhes bya ba ni rkang pa bkru ba'o //
translated: That refers to washing the feet.

original: 'dir gzhung ni bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: 'dir gzhung ni bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The text here is the Blessed One's statement:

original: rkang pa wa khar bkru'o zhes gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: rkang pa wa khar bkru'o zhes gsungs pa yin no //
translated: Wash your feet at the foot of the stairs.

original: rkang khrus kyi gzhi bya'o zhes bya ba ni 'di med par wa'i kha la sogs pa don grub pa rnam par nyams pa ste /
analyzed: rkang khrus kyi gzhi bya'o zhes bya ba ni 'di med par wa'i kha la sogs pa don grub pa rnam par nyams pa ste /
translated: The foot of the stairs means that without it, washing the feet at the foot of the stairs, etc. is not accomplished and is defective.

original: de'i phyir 'di ni res 'ga' bya ba dang res 'ga' mi bya ba yin gyi zhes bya ba yang dag par bstan pa'i don du dang por bya ba'i tshig sbyar ba'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir 'di ni res 'ga' bya ba dang res 'ga' mi bya ba yin gyi zhes bya ba yang dag par bstan pa'i don du dang por bya ba'i tshig sbyar ba'o //
translated: Therefore, the word first is used to indicate that this is sometimes to be done and sometimes not to be done.

original: dge 'dun gyi rdzas ni 'di'i gnas yin te /
analyzed: dge 'dun gyi rdzas ni 'di'i gnas yin te /
translated: The assembly's property is its place.

original: dge 'dun gyi rdzas ni gcig la skabs med de de bas na mang po'i tshig go //
analyzed: dge 'dun gyi rdzas ni gcig la skabs med de de bas na mang po'i tshig go //
translated: The assembly's property is not for one person, so the word many is used.

original: phyogs gang du zhe na /
analyzed: phyogs gang du zhe na /
translated: In which direction?

original: de'i phyir gtsug lag khang gi steng gi shar lho'i mtshams su'o zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: de'i phyir gtsug lag khang gi steng gi shar lho'i mtshams su'o zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: Therefore, it is said, ‚Äúin the southeast corner above the temple.‚Äù

original: rnam pa ji lta bu zhe na /
analyzed: rnam pa ji lta bu zhe na /
translated: What is its form?

original: de'i phyir rus sbal gyi rnam pa 'dra ba rtsub par ro zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: de'i phyir rus sbal gyi rnam pa 'dra ba rtsub par ro zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: Therefore, it is said, ‚Äúit is like a tortoise, rough.‚Äù

original: 'dir don ni dri ma sel bar byed pa'o //
analyzed: 'dir don ni dri ma sel bar byed pa'o //
translated: Here, the meaning is to remove impurities.

original: chol zangs sa las byas pa gzhag par bya'o zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: chol zangs sa las byas pa gzhag par bya'o zhes bya ba la /
translated: A spittoon made of clay should be placed.

original: 'di'i ming ni lhung zhing bzung ba la'o //
analyzed: 'di'i ming ni lhung zhing bzung ba la'o //
translated: Here, the name is for falling and holding.

original: ci las byas pa zhe na /
analyzed: ci las byas pa zhe na /
translated: What is it made of?

original: sa las byas pa zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: sa las byas pa zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: It is said, ‚Äúmade of clay.‚Äù

original: 'dir gzhung ni gser dang dngul dang beed'urya dang shel @33b las byas pa'i chol zangs nye bar gzhag par mi bya ste /
analyzed: 'dir gzhung ni gser dang dngul dang beed'urya dang shel @33b las byas pa'i chol zangs nye bar gzhag par mi bya ste /
translated: Here, the text says, ‚ÄúA spittoon made of gold, silver, lapis lazuli, or crystal should not be placed nearby.

original: 'on kyang sa'i rang bzhin gzhag par bya'o zhes gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: 'on kyang sa'i rang bzhin gzhag par bya'o zhes gsungs pa yin no //
translated: However, it should be made of clay.‚Äù

original: dbyibs ji lta bu zhe na de'i phyir zhabs glang po che'i rmig mthil 'dra la snying po can no zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: dbyibs ji lta bu zhe na de'i phyir zhabs glang po che'i rmig mthil 'dra la snying po can no zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: What is its shape? Therefore, it is said, ‚Äúthe base is like the sole of an elephant‚Äôs foot, and it is solid.‚Äù

original: 'dir don ni mi rdib pa'o //
analyzed: 'dir don ni mi rdib pa'o //
translated: Here, the meaning is: it does not collapse.

original: snying po can no zhes bya ba ni dag bzhin pa'i rkang pa gzhag pa'i don du 'di bya'o //
analyzed: snying po can no zhes bya ba ni dag bzhin pa'i rkang pa gzhag pa'i don du 'di bya'o //
translated: The meaning of having a core is to be understood as the purpose of placing the foot.

original: snying po gang du byas pa /
analyzed: snying po gang du byas pa /
translated: Where is the core made?

original: de dang ldan par shes she na /
analyzed: de dang ldan par shes she na /
translated: How is it known to be possessed?

original: dbus na yod pa zhes smos te /
analyzed: dbus na yod pa zhes smos te /
translated: It is said: in the middle.

original: rnam pa ji lta bu zhe na /
analyzed: rnam pa ji lta bu zhe na /
translated: What kind?

original: de'i phyir ka dam pa'i me tog 'dra ba rtsub pa dang ngo zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: de'i phyir ka dam pa'i me tog 'dra ba rtsub pa dang ngo zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: Therefore, it is said: like a kadamba flower, rough and with a hole.

original: rkang pa mi 'dred pa'i don du rtsub pa nyid do //
analyzed: rkang pa mi 'dred pa'i don du rtsub pa nyid do //
translated: Roughness is for the purpose of preventing slipping.

analyzed: bkrus nas kha sbub tu gzhag go zhes bya ba la /

analyzed: khrus byed pa 'di ni dri ma med pa nyid kyi don du ste /

analyzed: dri ma med pa nyid ni dri ma dang bral ba nyid do //

translated: Here, the establishment is in that which is the abode of pure water there. From that, it should be understood that other water is better than that.

translated: The text says that one should wash one's feet, and then pour the washing water outside the monastery or into a hole, and then wash again.

original: gang du gzhag par bya zhe na /
analyzed: gang du gzhag par bya zhe na /
translated: Where should one keep the water for washing the feet?

original: de'i phyir dge 'dun gyi ni khang thog tu'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir dge 'dun gyi ni khang thog tu'o //
translated: The text says that the Sa·πÖgha should keep it on the roof of the monastery.

analyzed: gang zag gi ni gnas khang gi sgo glegs kyi phag tu'o //
translated: The individual should keep it behind the door of his living quarters.

analyzed: gtsug lag khang gi phyogs gang du lhung bzed kyi byi dor la sogs pa byas pa der chus byug go //
translated: One should sprinkle the place in the monastery where one cleans the almsbowl, etc. with water, or one should smear it with cow dung.

analyzed: yang na bsku'o // de mdung rtse'i rnam pa lta bu'am /
translated: Or one should smear it with clay.

original: rdza rnga'i rnam pa lta bur ro zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: rdza rnga'i rnam pa lta bur ro zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: The text says that one should make it like the point of a spear, or like a clay drum.

original: rnam pa de lta bu zhes bya ba 'jug pa yin no //
analyzed: rnam pa de lta bu zhes bya ba 'jug pa yin no //
translated: The meaning of the text is that one should make it in that shape.

original: ci zhig gis bsku zhe na /
analyzed: ci zhig gis bsku zhe na /

original: ngo tsha dang ldan pa dang gus pa dang bcas pa dang zhes bya ba ni gal te yang ngo tsha ba'i bye brag gus pa yin na de ltar na yang sgra 'di las 'di shes pa ma yin pa de bas na 'di bzung ngo //
analyzed: ngo tsha dang ldan pa dang gus pa dang bcas pa dang zhes bya ba ni gal te yang ngo tsha ba'i bye brag gus pa yin na de ltar na yang sgra 'di las 'di shes pa ma yin pa de bas na 'di bzung ngo //
translated: ‚ÄúOne should be endowed with shame and respect‚Äù means that if shame is a particular kind of respect, then it is not known from this verse that it is different from respect. Therefore, it is mentioned here.

original: ngo tsha bskum pa'o //
analyzed: ngo tsha bskum pa'o //
translated: Shame is abashment.

original: rdzes dang bcas pa'o zhes bya ba ni gzhan la rag las pa'i rig pa'i ngo bo khrel yod pa'i bye brag ni rjes dang bcas pa'o //
analyzed: rdzes dang bcas pa'o zhes bya ba ni gzhan la rag las pa'i rig pa'i ngo bo khrel yod pa'i bye brag ni rjes dang bcas pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúOne should be endowed with decorum‚Äù means that one should be endowed with decorum, which is a particular kind of shame, the essence of which is a sense of propriety based on the opinions of others.

original: sems dma' ba zhes bya ba ni nga rgyal bcom pa'o //
analyzed: sems dma' ba zhes bya ba ni nga rgyal bcom pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúOne should have a humble mind‚Äù means that one should have conquered pride.

original: shes bzhin gyis zhes bya ba ni rang gi don te bsam gtan dang klog pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: shes bzhin gyis zhes bya ba ni rang gi don te bsam gtan dang klog pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúWith awareness‚Äù means for one‚Äôs own benefit, such as meditation and recitation.

original: dge ba gang yin zhes tshol ba can du bya'o //
analyzed: dge ba gang yin zhes tshol ba can du bya'o //
translated: ‚ÄúWhatever is virtuous‚Äù means one should be a seeker.

original: 'di la brten pa'i gnas bca' ba dang zhu ba dang 'khor sbyin pa la sogs pa las gzhan 'di la gnas pa la gang dge ba tshol bas gnas par bya'o //
analyzed: 'di la brten pa'i gnas bca' ba dang zhu ba dang 'khor sbyin pa la sogs pa las gzhan 'di la gnas pa la gang dge ba tshol bas gnas par bya'o //
translated: One should abide in this place, seeking whatever is virtuous, other than that which is based on this place, such as making offerings, asking questions, and giving to the assembly.

original: 'jig rten gyi bya ba la rtse gcig pas ni 'di mi bya zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: 'jig rten gyi bya ba la rtse gcig pas ni 'di mi bya zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: One should not do this with one-pointed focus on worldly activities. This is the meaning.

original: nyes par byed pa 'jug na bzlog par bya'o zhes @43a * //
analyzed: nyes par byed pa 'jug na bzlog par bya'o zhes @43a * //
translated: If one engages in misdeeds, one should turn away from them.

original: bya ba ni gal te gnas 'di nyes byed cung zad la 'jug pa de ni gnas pas bzlog par bya'o //
analyzed: bya ba ni gal te gnas 'di nyes byed cung zad la 'jug pa de ni gnas pas bzlog par bya'o //
translated: If one engages in even a little misdeed in this place, one should turn away from it while abiding in this place.

original: dge ba mi 'phel na de byed pa gnas pa gzhan la gtad par bya'o zhes bya ba la gal te gnas de la gnas pa'i dge ba 'phel bar mi 'gyur na /
analyzed: dge ba mi 'phel na de byed pa gnas pa gzhan la gtad par bya'o zhes bya ba la gal te gnas de la gnas pa'i dge ba 'phel bar mi 'gyur na /
translated: If virtue does not increase, one should entrust the practice to another who abides in this place. If virtue does not increase for one who abides in this place,

original: de nas de 'di la dge ba 'phel bar byed pa'i gnas gzhan la gtad par gsol bar bya'o //
analyzed: de nas de 'di la dge ba 'phel bar byed pa'i gnas gzhan la gtad par gsol bar bya'o //
translated: Then he should request that the other be given to him as a place for increasing virtue.

original: de'i phyir des kyang de la dri ba la sogs pas gnas kyi 'os nges par shes par byas nas gtang par bya'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir des kyang de la dri ba la sogs pas gnas kyi 'os nges par shes par byas nas gtang par bya'o //
translated: Therefore, he should be given to him after the other has ascertained his suitability by questioning him, etc.

original: gnas des kyang gnas pa de la 'di la yang bya ba ste /
analyzed: gnas des kyang gnas pa de la 'di la yang bya ba ste /
translated: The place should also be suitable for the resident.

original: sdig pa'i grogs po las bzlog par bya'o //
analyzed: sdig pa'i grogs po las bzlog par bya'o //
translated: He should be turned away from sinful friends.

original: dge ba la sbyar bar bya'o ;
analyzed: dge ba la sbyar bar bya'o ;
translated: He should be applied to virtue.

original: / de nye bar bsgrub par bya'o zhes bya ba ni dge ba la nye bar bsgrub par bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: / de nye bar bsgrub par bya'o zhes bya ba ni dge ba la nye bar bsgrub par bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: He should be established in it means he should be established in virtue.

original: ltung ba las bslang ba dang rjes su mthun pa'i mtsho ba'i yo byad bsgrub pa la brtson par bya'o zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: ltung ba las bslang ba dang rjes su mthun pa'i mtsho ba'i yo byad bsgrub pa la brtson par bya'o zhes bya ba ni /
translated: He should be diligent in the restoration of downfalls and in the equipment of the accessories of enlightenment.

original: ji ltar gnas pa la 'di gnyis bsgrub pa de ltar gnas kyis brtson par bya'o //
analyzed: ji ltar gnas pa la 'di gnyis bsgrub pa de ltar gnas kyis brtson par bya'o //
translated: The resident should be diligent in establishing these two for the visitor, just as he is in establishing them for himself.

original: des kyang de la de bya'o zhes bya ba'i mdo 'da' ba la gnas pas kyang gnas la 'di gnyis bsgrub pa la brtson par bya'o zhes bya ba rtogs par bya'o //
analyzed: des kyang de la de bya'o zhes bya ba'i mdo 'da' ba la gnas pas kyang gnas la 'di gnyis bsgrub pa la brtson par bya'o zhes bya ba rtogs par bya'o //
translated: The sutra says, One should live in such a way that one would not be ashamed to face them, and one should understand that one should strive to accomplish these two.

original: lhan cig gnas pa dang nye gnas dang mkhan po dang slob dpon dang mkhan po gcig pa dang slob dpon gcig pa dang gtam 'dres pa dang phebs par smra ba dang smos 'drin dang 'grogs bshes rnams kyis nad g-yogs bya'o zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: lhan cig gnas pa dang nye gnas dang mkhan po dang slob dpon dang mkhan po gcig pa dang slob dpon gcig pa dang gtam 'dres pa dang phebs par smra ba dang smos 'drin dang 'grogs bshes rnams kyis nad g-yogs bya'o zhes bya ba la /
translated: One's attendants, disciples, preceptors, teachers, co-preceptors, co-teachers, friends, acquaintances, relatives, and companions should nurse one when one is sick.

original: gtam 'dres pa zhes bya ba ni gtam dri ba la sogs pa dang dga' ba spyod pa nyid kyis dga' ba nyid du bkri ba'o //
analyzed: gtam 'dres pa zhes bya ba ni gtam dri ba la sogs pa dang dga' ba spyod pa nyid kyis dga' ba nyid du bkri ba'o //
translated: The term friends refers to those with whom one shares pleasantries, such as asking about each other's health and engaging in pleasant conversation.

original: phebs par smra ba ni gang dang lhan cig tu bag phebs par gyur cing de la dus su kun du smra bar byed pa yin no //
analyzed: phebs par smra ba ni gang dang lhan cig tu bag phebs par gyur cing de la dus su kun du smra bar byed pa yin no //
translated: The term acquaintances refers to those with whom one can converse freely and with whom one can discuss anything at any time.

original: smos 'drin zhes bya ba ni gang dang lhan cig tu gnas gcig na 'dug pa dang lhan cig tu 'gro ba la sogs pas 'dris pa khas blangs pas yan lag dang yan lag can gyi dngos po skyes pa'o //
analyzed: smos 'drin zhes bya ba ni gang dang lhan cig tu gnas gcig na 'dug pa dang lhan cig tu 'gro ba la sogs pas 'dris pa khas blangs pas yan lag dang yan lag can gyi dngos po skyes pa'o //
translated: Familiarity is a relationship of master and disciple that arises from accepting to live together, to go together, and so on.

original: 'grogs bshes zhes bya ba ni gang gis gang mthong ngam thos ma thag kho nar yan lag can gyi dangs po skyes pa nas dga' ba tsam skyes pa'o //üîΩbyed pa dang po med na 'og mas so zhes bya ba gtsug lag khang gi nye gnas la sogs pa rnams dang lhan cig tu snga mas nye gnas byed pa med pa la phyi ma phyi mas nye gnas bya'o //
analyzed: 'grogs bshes zhes bya ba ni gang gis gang mthong ngam thos ma thag kho nar yan lag can gyi dangs po skyes pa nas dga' ba tsam skyes pa'o // byed pa dang po med na 'og mas so zhes bya ba gtsug lag khang gi nye gnas la sogs pa rnams dang lhan cig tu snga mas nye gnas byed pa med pa la phyi ma phyi mas nye gnas bya'o //
translated: Friendship is a relationship of master and disciple that arises from the mere pleasure of seeing or hearing the other person.üîΩIf the first is not present, the latter should be done.üîΩIf there is no prior relationship of master and disciple with the temple attendant and so on, the latter should be the master and disciple of the former.

original: gtsug lag khang dang lhan cig tu nye @43b gnas byed pa med pa la mthar gnas pas nye gnas bya'o //üîΩde yang med na mkhan pos so //
analyzed: gtsug lag khang dang lhan cig tu nye @43b gnas byed pa med pa la mthar gnas pas nye gnas bya'o // de yang med na mkhan pos so //
translated: If there is no relationship of master and disciple with the temple, the latter should be the master and disciple of the former.üîΩIf that is not possible, the preceptor should do it.

original: de yang med na slob dpon gyis so zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: de yang med na slob dpon gyis so zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
translated: If that is not possible, the teacher should do it, and so on.

original: mkhan po la lci ba nyid kyi phyir de'i sngon du gang zhig dang por 'os pa nyid slob dpon la mthar gnas pa la gtsug lag khang dang lhan cig nye gnas pas so //
analyzed: mkhan po la lci ba nyid kyi phyir de'i sngon du gang zhig dang por 'os pa nyid slob dpon la mthar gnas pa la gtsug lag khang dang lhan cig nye gnas pas so //
translated: Because of the heaviness of the preceptor, the first one who is suitable is the teacher, because he is the one who is the basis for the preceptor.

original: de bas na shin tu nye bar gnas pa nyid kyi phyir lhag ma snga ma la dang po 'os pa nyid do //
analyzed: de bas na shin tu nye bar gnas pa nyid kyi phyir lhag ma snga ma la dang po 'os pa nyid do //
translated: Therefore, the first one who is suitable is the prior, because he is the one who is the basis for the monastery.

original: 'dir klog pa'i slob dpon yang bzung ba nyid yin no zhes bya ba ni slob dpon bzung bas so //
analyzed: 'dir klog pa'i slob dpon yang bzung ba nyid yin no zhes bya ba ni slob dpon bzung bas so //
translated: Here, the reading teacher is also included by the word ‚Äúteacher.‚Äù

original: cig car mi nus na gnas pa gang dang 'jug pa'i'o zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: cig car mi nus na gnas pa gang dang 'jug pa'i'o zhes bya ba la /
translated: If one is unable to do both at once, one should be a prior or an instructor.

original: cig car zhes pa ni nad pa la nye bar gnas du ma la'o //
analyzed: cig car zhes pa ni nad pa la nye bar gnas du ma la'o //
translated: ‚ÄúAt once‚Äù means in the case of many sick people.

original: mi nus pa la zhes bya ba ni gal te gcig las yang nye bar gnas pa mi nus na gnas par nye bar gnas par bya zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: mi nus pa la zhes bya ba ni gal te gcig las yang nye bar gnas pa mi nus na gnas par nye bar gnas par bya zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: ‚ÄúUnable‚Äù means if one is unable to be a prior to more than one person, one should be a prior.

original: gnas pa su zhig ce na /
analyzed: gnas pa su zhig ce na /
translated: Who is a prior?

original: gang dang 'jug pa'i'o zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: gang dang 'jug pa'i'o zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: He says, ‚Äúone who is an instructor.‚Äù

analyzed: gang zhig la zhu ba byas nas bya ba byed pa gang gi tshe gang la gang gis gal che ba de'i de la 'jug pa'o //
translated: When one does something for someone who requests it, one engages in that for the sake of that person.

original: shin tu gnod par byed pa'i phongs pa la thams cad dor nas zhes bya ba don gyis go bar bya'o //
analyzed: shin tu gnod par byed pa'i phongs pa la thams cad dor nas zhes bya ba don gyis go bar bya'o //
translated: One should understand the meaning of having abandoned all that is very harmful by the word even.

original: 'dir de'i rtags tsam pa yang rab tu byung ba dang 'dra'o zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: 'dir de'i rtags tsam pa yang rab tu byung ba dang 'dra'o zhes bya ba la /
translated: Here, one who is like a monk is one who has merely the signs of a monk.

original: 'dir zhes bya ba ni nad g-yog bya ba'i yul la gang zhig rab tu byung ba'i don du skra bregs pa la sogs pa'i rtags tsam gyis sbyar cing da ltar yang rab tu 'byung du ma bcug pa de ni rab tu byung ba dang 'dra bar rig par
analyzed: 'dir zhes bya ba ni nad g-yog bya ba'i yul la gang zhig rab tu byung ba'i don du skra bregs pa la sogs pa'i rtags tsam gyis sbyar cing da ltar yang rab tu 'byung du ma bcug pa de ni rab tu byung ba dang 'dra bar rig par
translated: Here means in the domain of nursing. One who is like a monk is one who is engaged by merely the signs of a monk, such as shaving the head, for the sake of being a monk, but is not presently allowed to be a monk.

original: bya'o // ji ltar rab tu byung ba la nye bar gnas pa de ltar nad pa de la bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: bya'o // ji ltar rab tu byung ba la nye bar gnas pa de ltar nad pa de la bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //

original: tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa na ba yal bar mi dor ro //
analyzed: tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa na ba yal bar mi dor ro //
translated: One should not abandon a fellow brahmacƒÅrin who is sick.

analyzed: de la nad g-yog med na mthar thug pa man chad las bsko bar bya'o zhes bya ba la /
translated: If he has no attendant, he should be appointed from the end of the final group.

analyzed: med na zhes bya ba ni gtsug lag khang la sogs pa dang lhan cig tu'o //

original: gang man chad las bsko bar bya zhe na /
analyzed: gang man chad las bsko bar bya zhe na /

original: de'i phyir mthar thug pa zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: de'i phyir mthar thug pa zhes bya ba smos te /

original: gal te gcig byin nas kyang nyer gnas med par gyur nas /
analyzed: gal te gcig byin nas kyang nyer gnas med par gyur nas /

analyzed: de bzhin du ji srid du dge 'dun gyi mthar thug pa man chad las bsko bar bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: In the same way, he should be appointed from the end of the final group of the sa·πÖgha. This is the meaning.

original: ma 'byor na dge 'dun gyis las sbyin par bya'o zhes bya ba ni gal te tshol du bcug kyang ma 'byor bar gyur na de nas dge 'dun gyis sbyin par bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //

analyzed: med na zhes bya ba ni dge 'dun gyi'o //

translated: This means that if one gives to those who are attached to images, stupas, ornaments, etc., what need is there to mention giving to others?

translated: Therefore, one should make offerings to the Sa·πÖgha, such as giving water and erecting parasols.üîΩIf one does not have these, one should do this work for the Sa·πÖgha.
